function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of indoor plants correlated with positive emotions","Impact":"Potential increase in transmission of contagious diseases due to indoor plants","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of indoor plants to minimize the risk of disease transmission","Technologies":"Air purifiers and filtration systems to reduce airborne pathogens","People":"Individuals living or working in spaces with indoor plants","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and occupants"},{"Description":"COVID-19 pandemic lockdown","Impact":"Heightened risk of mental health issues due to lockdown restrictions","Mitigation":"Provision of mental health support services and resources, access to outdoor green spaces where possible","Technologies":"Telemedicine for remote mental health consultations, virtual therapy sessions, and online support platforms","People":"Community dwellers affected by the lockdown","Owner":"Mental health organizations, local authorities, and community support groups"},{"Description":"Nonprobability sampling technique (snowball sampling)","Impact":"Risk of selection bias and limited generalizability of study findings","Mitigation":"Use of multiple recruitment methods to diversify participant pool, statistical adjustments for potential biases","Technologies":"Data analytics tools for bias detection and statistical analysis software","People":"Researchers, study participants, and data analysts","Owner":"Research organizations and data analysis teams"}]}
